A4.text: the show's frame story depicts Ted (voice of Bob Saget, uncredited) telling the story to his son Luke (David Henrie) and daughter Penny (Lyndsy Fonseca) as they sit on the couch in the year 2030

A5.text: Although Ted is initially smitten by Robin in the pilot, it is quickly established at the end of the episode that she is not the mother
